name: Aroma Strategy
desc: You can look at the card at the very top of your Deck at any time.

name: Baggy Sleeves
desc: If one of your monsters of Level 5 or higher is destroyed in battle, in your next Draw Phase a normal draw gives you 2 cards.

name: Balance
desc: Your starting hand will reflect the card balance of your Deck.
chars: Mako Tsunami (Level 20), Maximillion Pegasus (Drop), Paradox Brothers (Drop), Aster Phoenix (Drop), Alexis Rhodes (Drop)

name: Bandit
desc: Can be used if your Life Points are at 1500 or below. Select and take control of 1 card Set in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Beatdown
desc: This turn, the ATK of all face-up monsters on your field increases by the number of monsters of Level 5 or higher on your field times 300. This skill can only be used once per turn.

name: Blessing of the Cyber Angel
desc: Can be used if your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Instead of doing a normal draw, a "Cyber Angel" monster is added to your hand from outside of your Deck. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Bluff Trap
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1200. Statue of the Wicked is set in your Spell & Trap Zone.

name: Bring it!
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800. Instead of doing a normal draw, a Level 8 DARK Warrior-Type monster is added to your hand from your Deck.

name: Buzz On
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random Insect-Type monster.

name: Chain Reaction
desc: Inflict 200 points of damage to your opponent's Life every time you activate a Trap Card.

name: Cheater's Coin
desc: If your Life Points are at least 1000 more than opponent's, and if you have at least 5 cards in your hand, your coin tosses always land on heads.

name: Compensation
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decreases by 1000. Send the card on the top of your Deck to the Graveyard, and recover 300 LP.

name: Creator
desc: Can be used if your Life Points drop below 2000. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, a powerful card, from outside of your Deck, is added to your hand. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: DARK as Night
desc: Can be used after your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Play the Field Spell "Mystic Plasma Zone." If there already is Field Spell on your side of the Field, return it to your hand. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Destiny Board
desc: Can be used if Dark Necrofear is in your Graveyard, and your LP are at 2000 or below. At the end of your 5th turn after activating this skill, you win the Duel. This skill is negated if "Dark Necrofear" leaves your Graveyard. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Destiny Calling
desc: Can be used after your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Play the Field Spell "Dark City." If there already is Field Spell on your side of the Field, return it to your hand. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Destiny Draw
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 2000. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw the card of your choice.

name: Dino Destruction
desc: Can be used if a Level 6 Dinosaur-Type monster is on your field. If that monster attacks a monster in Defense Position this turn, the opponent takes battle damage equal to the amount that ATK exceeds DEF. This skill can only be used once per turn.

name: Dino Rampage
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800, and you have a Dinosaur-Type normal monster on your field. That monster can attack twice during the Battle Phase, this turn. This skill can only be used once per turn.

name: Dinos Find a Way
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random Dinosaur-Type monster.

name: Dinosaur Kingdom
desc: Begin Duel with the Field Spell "Jurassic World" activated.

name: Draw Pass
desc: In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, recover 300 Life Points. This skill can only be used three times per Duel.
chars: Mai Valentine (Drop), Ishizu Ishtar (Level 4), Aster Phoenix (Drop), Chazz Princeton (Drop)

name: Draw Sense: DARK
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1500. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random DARK-attribute monster.
chars: Yami Marik (Level 13), Yami Bakura (Level 13), Jaden Yuki (Drop), Aster Phoenix (Drop), Dr. Vellian Crowler (Drop), Bastion Misawa (Drop)

name: Draw Sense: EARTH
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1500. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random EARTH-attribute monster.
chars: Aster Phoenix (Drop), Chazz Princeton (Drop), Alexis Rhodes (Drop), Dr. Vellian Crowler (Level 13), Bastion Misawa (Drop)

name: Draw Sense: FIRE
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1500. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random FIRE-attribute monster.
chars: Joey Wheeler (Drop), Mokuba Kaiba (Drop), Jaden Yuki (Drop), Aster Phoenix (Drop), Chazz Princeton (Drop), Alexis Rhodes (Drop), Bastion Misawa (Drop)

name: Draw Sense: High Level
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random monster of Level 5 or higher.
chars: Seto Kaiba (Level 20), Rex Raptor (Level 13), Paradox Brothers (Drop), Chazz Princeton (Drop), Dr. Vellian Crowler (Drop)

name: Draw Sense: LIGHT
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1500. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random LIGHT-attribute monster.
chars: Mokuba Kaiba (Level 20), Jaden Yuki (Drop), Aster Phoenix (Drop), Chazz Princeton (Drop), Dr. Vellian Crowler (Drop), Bastion Misawa (Drop)

name: Draw Sense: Low Level
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random monster of Level 4 or lower.

name: Draw Sense: Spell/Trap
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random Spell/Trap card.
chars: Yami Yugi (Level 13), Odion (Level 13), Chazz Princeton (Drop), Alexis Rhodes (Drop), Dr. Vellian Crowler (Drop)

name: Draw Sense: WATER
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1500. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random WATER-attribute monster.
chars: Mako Tsunami (Level 13), Mokuba Kaiba (Drop), Aster Phoenix (Drop), Chazz Princeton (Drop), Alexis Rhodes (Drop), Bastion Misawa (Drop)

name: Draw Sense: WIND
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1500. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random WIND-attribute monster.
chars: Mai Valentine (Level 20), Jaden Yuki (Drop), Alexis Rhodes (Drop), Bastion Misawa (Drop)

name: Duel, Standby!
desc: Gives 1 more card in each player's starting hand.

name: Elements Unite!
desc: You will start the Duel with 500 Life Points and your starting hand will be 1 card, which is "Gate Guardian." In addition, you will start the Duel with "Sanga of the Thunder," "Kazejin," and "Suijin" on the side of your field. Their effects are negated and they cannot attack as long as they are face-up on the field.

name: Endless Trap Hell
desc: Can be used when you have 3 Trap Cards in your Graveyard. 1 random Trap Card in your Graveyard is added to your hand. Then, shuffle 1 random Trap Card in your Graveyard is shuffled into your Deck. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Extra, Extra
desc: Can be used if your Life Points decrease by 2000. In the Draw Phase, a card you draw is duplicated.

name: Fairy's Smile
desc: If you normal draw a Fairy-Type monster card during the Draw Phase, the card is shown to the opponent and you recover 1000 Life Points.

name: Fields of the Warriors
desc: Begin Duel with the Field Spell "Sogen" activated.

name: Fiend Farewell
desc: Can be used when one of your monsters is destroyed by battle. 1 random Fiend-Type monster from your Deck is sent to the graveyard.

name: Firm as the EARTH
desc: Can be used after your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Play the Field Spell "Gaia Power." If there already is Field Spell on your side of the Field, return it to your hand. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Flight of the Harpies
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random "Harpie" card.

name: Fusion Time
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1500. Instead of doing a normal draw, "Polymerization" is added to your hand from outside of your Deck.

name: Grandpa's Cards
desc: Begin Duel with 5 Exodia pieces in your Deck.

name: Gravekeeper's Lot
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random "Gravekeeper's" card.

name: Grit
desc: Skill activation is determined by probability at the start of each of your opponent's turns. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, your Life Points will not fall below 1.

name: Guardian Call
desc: Can be used when your Life Points decrease by 1800. Randomly add 1 "Guardian" card from your Deck to your hand. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Harpies' Hunting Ground
desc: Begin the Duel with the Field Spell Card "Harpies' Hunting Ground" on the top of your deck.

name: Harpies' Last Will
desc: 6 "Harpie" cards in your Graveyard are banished, and 1 "Harpie's Feather Duster" card is added to your hand from outside your Deck.

name: Heavy Starter
desc: If you have 3 or more Level 5 or higher monsters with different names in your Deck, you will have an improved chance of having a Level 5 or higher monster in your starting hand.

name: Holy Guard
desc: You take no battle damage during your turn.

name: Insect Uprising
desc: Can be used if there are 3 or more Insect-Type monsters on your field. Lowers ATK of all face-up monsters on the opponent's field by 800 points. This skill can only be used once per turn.

name: It's a Toon World
desc: Begin Duel with the Continuous Spell Toon World activated.

name: Moth to the Flame
desc: Turn counts are double-speed for any Petit Moth with Cocoon of Evolution equipped on your side of the field.

name: Labyrinth Builder
desc: Shuffle 2 cards from your hand into the Deck to create "Labyrinth Wall" on your side of the field. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Land of the Ojamas
desc: Begin Duel with the Field Spell "Ojama Country" activated.

name: Last Gamble
desc: Can be used in your Main Phase, starting from the fifth turn. Upon activation, reduces your LP to 100 and discards 2 cards from your hand. You roll a die and draw that number of cards. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Life Cost 0
desc: Can be used if your Life Points are at 1000 or below. Until the end of the opponent's next turn, you do not have to pay Life Points to activate a card. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: LP Boost α
desc: Increases starting Life Points by 1000.
chars: Joey Wheeler (Level 4), Mai Valentine (Drop), Maximillion Pegasus (Level 4), Paradox Brothers (Drop), Jaden Yuki (Drop), Chazz Princeton (Drop), Dr. Vellian Crowler (Drop), Bastion Misawa (Drop)

name: LP Boost β
desc: Increases starting Life Points by 1500, reduces hand by 1 card.
chars: Mai Valentine (Level 13), Jaden Yuki (Drop), Aster Phoenix (Drop), Chazz Princeton (Drop), Alexis Rhodes (Drop), Dr. Vellian Crowler (Drop)

name: LP Boost γ
desc: Increases starting Life Points by 2500, reduces hand by 2 cards.
chars: Joey Wheeler (Drop), Téa Gardner (Level 13), Yami Marik (Level 4), Aster Phoenix (Drop), Alexis Rhodes (Drop), Dr. Vellian Crowler (Drop)

name: Luck on Your Side
desc: If your Life Points drop below 1000, your coin tosses always land on heads.

name: Master of Fusion
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800. Instead of doing a normal draw, "Polymerization" is added to your hand from outside of your Deck.

name: Master of Rites
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random Ritual-Monster or Ritual-Spell card.

name: Master of Rites II
desc: Begin Duel with the Continuous Spell "Ritual Cage" activated.

name: Menace from the Deep
desc: Can be used if "Umi" is on the field, and you have a Water-attribute normal monster on your field. That monster can attack your opponent directly. this turn. At the end of the Battle Phase, that monster is sent to the Graveyard. This skill can only be used once per turn.

name: Middle Age Mechs
desc: Begin Duel with the Continuous Spell "Ancient Gear Castle" activated.

name: Mighty as FIRE
desc: Can be used after your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Play the Field Spell "Molten Destruction." If there already is Field Spell on your side of the Field, return it to your hand. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Mind Scan
desc: If your Life Points are 3000 or more, you can see the cards Set in your opponent's field.

name: Monstermorph: Evolution
desc: Can be used each time your Life Point decrease by 1500. Send a monster (except a Token) on your side of the field to the Graveyard. Then randomly play a monster that is same Attribute and Type as the monster you sent to the Graveyard, but is 1 Level higher from your Deck (the monster must be able to be Normal Summoned.) This skill can only be used once per turn.

name: Mythic Depths
desc: Begin Duel with the Field Spell "Umi" activated.

name: No Mortal Can Resist
desc: Can be used when your Life points are at least 1000 less than the opponent's. All monsters in the opponent's Graveyard changes to Skull Servant. This skill can only be used once per turn.

name: Ojama Go!
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800. Special Summon "Ojama Token" on your opponent's side of the field in Defense Position.

name: Ojama Overflow
desc: Can be used if your Life Points are at 500 or below. Special Summon as many "Ojama Token" as possible in the Defense Position on your opponent's side of the Field. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Parasite Infestation
desc: After starting hands are dealt, 1 or 2 "Parasite Paracide" cards are added to your opponent's deck, face-up.

name: Peak Performance
desc: Begin Duel with the Field Spell "Mountain" activated.

name: Power of Dark
desc: Begin Duel with the Field Spell "Yami" activated.

name: Precognition
desc: You can view the top card of both players' Decks until the end of the 5th turn.

name: Quick as the WIND
desc: Can be used after your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Play the Field Spell "Rising Air Current." If there already is Field Spell on your side of the Field, return it to your hand. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Radiating LIGHT
desc: Can be used after your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Play the Field Spell "Luminous Spark." If there already is Field Spell on your side of the Field, return it to your hand. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Reinforcements
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800. Return one card from your hand to your Deck and draw a random Warrior-Type monster.
chars: Joey Wheeler (Level 20), Jaden Yuki (Level 20), Aster Phoenix (Level 20), Alexis Rhodes (Drop)

name: Restart
desc: Can be used only once after starting hands are dealt. Your starting hand is redrawn.
chars: Yugi Muto (Level 20), Bandit Keith (Level 20), Paradox Brothers (Level 13), Jaden Yuki (Drop), Dr. Vellian Crowler (Drop)

name: Right Back at You
desc: Can be used in the Main Phase of your next turn following the turn in which you took battle damage. Select 1 face-up monster on your field. This turn, the selected monster's ATK increases by half of the battle damage received in the turn you last took battle damage. This skill can only be used once per turn.

name: Roll 'n' Boost
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 2000. Show 1 monster card in your hand to the opponent and roll the die once. The Level of the monster shown becomes that of the die number until the end of the turn.

name: Sealed Tombs
desc: Until the end of the opponent's next turn, neither you nor the opponent can Special Summon monsters from the Graveyard. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Silent as WATER
desc: Can be used after your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Play the Field Spell "Umiiruka." If there already is Field Spell on your side of the Field, return it to your hand. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Sleight of Hand
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1500. Add 1 "7 Completed" card, hidden in your wristband, to your hand. This skill can only be used once per turn and twice per Duel.

name: Sorcery Conduit
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800. In the Draw Phase, instead of doing a normal draw, draw a random Spellcaster-Type monster.

name: Spell Specialist
desc: If your Deck contains 5 or more Spell Cards with different names, you will have improved chances of having a Spell Card in your starting hand.

name: Surprise Present
desc: Select 1 card Set in your Spell & Trap Zone, and force it on your opponent. Only the player that activates this skill can view this card. This skill can only be used once per Duel.

name: Switcheroo
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1000. Return 1 card in your hand to your Deck and draw another. This skill can only be used once per turn and twice per Duel.[Notes 10]

name: Teacherly Discipline
desc: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1500. Declare a Monster, Spell or Trap Card. That type of card will be randomly selected from your opponent's Deck and placed on top of their Deck. Neither player will see what the card is. Nothing will be placed on top of your opponent's Deck if the declared card type is not in their Deck.

name: Tether of Defeat
desc: Can be used when one of the opponent's monster is destroyed in battle. The Top card from either your or the opponents deck is sent to the graveyard.

name: The Tie that Binds
desc: Until the end of your turn, the ATK of all face-up monsters on your field increases by the number of monsters on your field times 100. This skill can only be used once per turn.

name: Three-Star Demotion
desc: Can be used by paying 3000 Life Points. Until the End Phase, reduce the Level of all monsters in your hand by 3. This skill can only be used once per turn.[Notes 11]

name: Thunder, Water, and Wind
desc: Can be used when you Life Points decrease by 1800. Randomly add one "Sanga", "Kazejin" or "Suijin" to your hand (these cards are not drawn from your deck). Can only be used once per Duel.

name: Titan Showdown
desc: Whichever player has double or more LP than the other takes double battle damage.

name: Where the Heroes Dwell
desc: Can be used after your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Play the Field Spell "Skyscraper." If there already is Field Spell on your side of the Field, return it to your hand. This skill can only be used once per Duel.
